website_summaries.verdict: The perfect buy for customers wanting the efficiency of a phone ring without ruining the   sleek design of their phone.
pros: Transparent adhesive is barely noticeable on the back of almost any phone
Buyers claim the adhesive on this phone ring is extremely strong
Comes in a pack of 4 for easy sharing or replacing
cons: Some buyers had issues with the ring coming loose after a few months use

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Pop Sockets (And I Will Fight You)
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to hold onto my phone better since I got a bigger phone, but I think Pop Sockets look really dumb. When I was in Tokyo in the spring, everyone had folio phone cases with wristlets or else they had these ring-style holders. I love these things. They stick on with 3M adhesive, so they don't fall off or melt off easily, they stick to any flat surface (I have one on a faux leather folio case and it's holding just fine) and I feel like I get a better grip for taking pictures or just holding my phone. I don't make a habit of dropping my phone but I'm even less worried about it now.
customer_reviews.author: B. Marble

customer_reviews.title: Works like it's supposed to. Doesn't obscure your case.
customer_reviews.text: I love the transparency since I also purchased a very beautiful case on the same day and didn't want to cover it up. This sticks like crazy so make sure you line it up EXACTLY how you want it before putting it on and probably stick it on a case rather than directly on your phone. There is an air bubble or space in the center but it really doesn't bother me that much. I love that this helps me keep a grip on my phone since I have the dropsies all the time. The ring spins to different angles, even though it is a bit tough to turn at first but seems to be getting better.
customer_reviews.author: T. Froemel

customer_reviews.title: I love this ring grip
customer_reviews.text: I love this ring grip!! I have not had much luck with the adhesive on other grips. This one holds strong! I love that its transparent too so it doesn't cover the design on my new case. The price is great and its a 4-pack so if I want to change my case, I can just use another one instead of removing from the other case. Works well on the textured case on my daughter's tablet too!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Kuykendall

customer_reviews.title: This is the best thing since smart phone were invented
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing since smart phone were invented. I can hang on to my phone with out fear of it slipping out of my hand. That would be enough for me to like this product but it also acts as a stand for the phone. Now I can Skype without having to continuously hold the phone so I can see and be seen. Nice. The design with the clear secure sticker is brilliant because my phone has a decorative cover and it doesn't interfere with the design. My husband likes the ring also. Good idea!!!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed on my favorite ring holders.
customer_reviews.text: My 3rd time purchasing these ring holders, because the quality was excellent and they worked perfectly on all of my family's cellphones. I am very disappointed on this order because they shipped me used product that is unusable. (Loose ring and adhesive is useless) I had always provided good rating reviews, but this time my rating goes down to a 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: 5AVCALI

customer_reviews.title: They break really easily.
customer_reviews.text: I edited my review. I thought these were awesome when I got them but I’ve had them less than a month and I’ve already had two break. They don’t last at all. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shellybelly

customer_reviews.title: I like to change out my cases
customer_reviews.text: Received today. I like to change out my cases, gives me a chance to clean and sanitize my phone. Being transparent is so much better than designer color as it doesn’t distract from case. Seems secure. Makes a case I bought that was a bit slippery much more secure in my hand.
customer_reviews.author: E.D.

customer_reviews.title: Love them, but do not last long.
customer_reviews.text: I prefer these over pop sockets, but unfortunately they do not have a very long usability. And this is pretty consistent no matter where you buy them from. If this is just casual use for propping your phone up every once in a while, go for it. But if you intend on using them pretty heavily to hold your phone a little easier and moving their position frequently, I wouldn't reccomend these. Or if you don't mind replacing them every few months I suppose you could, because they have great grip and just feel more natural in the hand, to me, than a pop socket, but that's just a bit unnecessarily pricey for me.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: It works it just does it had one job and it did it
customer_reviews.text: There ok one fell apart though but the price is reasonable so I'll be getting more soon I like these better than my old popsocket the glue is way way strong the e metal is what broke mainly because I drop my phone but trying to put a new one in it's was like pulling teeth to to get it of my phone case so I love it
customer_reviews.author: jay hollis

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and definitely hold
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and definitely hold. Also I thought I was getting two Ring holders but received four. So that was a nice surprise. But unfortunately they were too uncomfortable for me. The metal was thick, stiff and hurt my fingers. Not comfy at all. So three stars for the holders and one star for offering a return.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki A.

customer_reviews.title: The right amount of resistance for positioning the ring
customer_reviews.text: This product works great. It has just the right amount of stiffness to position the ring for holding the phone upright. And the stiffness is not excessive so as to make it difficult to reposition the ring. The biggest challenge would be to stick the ring in the right position to stand up your phone at a good angle. Fortunately, the stiffness in positioning the ring allows you to adjust the angle without slippage in the angle of adjustment. Also, putting your finger through the hole allows you to have a more secure hold on your phone when playing games or taking selfies. I don't know how well it would work with a heavier tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Don Kxxxxx

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love these rings. I bought a beautiful detailed case and didn’t want to cover any part of it. This was perfect! I purchased a few months ago. The ring held strong for a long time and through a lot of use. I admit I push the ring from side to side when I’m bored. It just now lost its ability to keep the ring in one place. I used to be able to use it as a stand but no longer can. Still love it and still have not taken it off even though I have more from the pack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best stick on rings I’ve tried!
customer_reviews.text: I’m back for a 3rd time to buy another set of these :-) I need to just order in bulk. Ive got them on phone, E-readers & tablets. They stick extremely well! I have to work a credit card underneath to get one off. The adhesive gets bubbly looking after the 1st time you take 1 off, although it sticks just as well. As cheap and permanent as they are it’s easier to just come back here and order more :-)
customer_reviews.author: Penguins Rule

customer_reviews.title: Transparency Is Key
customer_reviews.text: Great product especially if the back of your phone has a design element to it and you want to showcase it with a clear ring holder! This does the trick although the ring itself should be a bit more sturdy! After a few uses the ring is loose!!
customer_reviews.author: Grumpy4evah

customer_reviews.title: I was so happy with these for about a week
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy with these for about a week, but then the ring lost its strength and now it's weak and just hangs there. I can no longer use it to hold up my phone. I'm so disappointed. I really wanted to love these.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole P.

customer_reviews.title: Do not last
customer_reviews.text: I got these and was SUPER happy....at first. They only last about a month and then the ring becomes so loose it wont work as a stand anymore. they do stick on very well and they are great for that month. i just really wished the ring lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: C.I.M.F

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time (or money) on the others!
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these and then got a new phone and ordered a different ring for it. I hated it! It was too large and then started becoming loose so it would flop back and forth. This is great, sturdy but not too tight so it's easy to move and it has a super-strong adhesive.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: Broke within a month, buy iRing instead
customer_reviews.text: I had previously used a better brand (iRing) but wanted a transparent option so I thought this was a worthy replacement. It is lesser thickness than iRing, so didn't fit into the holder I have on my car without adaptation. But worse, the ring lost resistance within a month. Just flops around, doesn't work as a kickstand, completely worthless utility. And now I can't get it off my case, which is another feature the iRing offers -- easy on/off. Buy the iRing instead. This is a cheap knockoff.
customer_reviews.author: rba

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: These are very handy. Make dropping your phone almost impossible, and so easy to hold in various positions. Also works as a prop to hold your phone up for watching Netflix, etc. You get four, so one for everyone in the family, or save some for spares. My last one lasted for about four years before needing replaced.
customer_reviews.author: High Hopes

customer_reviews.title: Cheap looking when applied to phone
customer_reviews.text: Did not like the bubbles which you can see when it is applied that can’t be ironed out. Very unsightly & cheap looking. Should have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Judy A. Steen

customer_reviews.title: Just afraid it's not going to stay on
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be sturdy now and I will update if it stays on but it seems a little worrisome to hold a pretty expensive item and not come loose. Mind you I've only had it a short time. So far so good though.
customer_reviews.author: shadow11990

customer_reviews.title: Most useful cell phone accesory
customer_reviews.text: My wife finds this the most useful cell phone accessory. Makes it easy to use her shopping list app without having to worry about dropping her phone. Only issue is that she cannot use her phone with the wireless charging station when using the cell phone ring holder.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M Horn

customer_reviews.title: Nice option
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for something which was clear and did not hide the case, and this was the best option out there. The installation instructions were appreciated. So far, so good - the product does its job well.
customer_reviews.author: JC65

customer_reviews.title: Great if you don't want to use a case
customer_reviews.text: My new phone is coming in couple days, but be careful putting it on. I did one on my S7 and you can see the air bubbles on it and anything that gets trapped inbetween. Great product tho. I love using these instead of cases. Just stick your hand in your pocket and loop a finger through and its about impossible to drop your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Chef Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: The only thing bad I can say about these is that they are a little bit sharp around the edges of the ring. it rubbed blister on my finger. But I didn't loose my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Janet M.

customer_reviews.title: Better than a knob.
customer_reviews.text: I love the security this gives me when holding my phone. I also like to use the ring to prop my phone up when I'm watching a video. However the finger ring became wobbly after 5 months. These weren't very expensive so that fact doesn't completely ruin the ring for me. When replacing it, I will probably try another brand just out of curiosity.
customer_reviews.author: Vivecka Fortner

customer_reviews.title: No problems
customer_reviews.text: I love this ring holder, it sticks with no problem and the ring is moveable so it can be adjusted to any angle needed. Please note, once you stick it to your case, it's not coming off. If you are not please with your initial placement, you may as well purchase a new case. No worries tho, you have 3 others to use. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: ThatGirlT

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work as a phone stand
customer_reviews.text: If you're just looking for a ring holder to keep from dropping your phone; this will do the trick. I want a ring to be stable enough to use as a prop up for videos, etc. It took less than three days for this to lose it's stability enough to prop up my phone. I'm returning unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These work great!
customer_reviews.text: I attached the clear holder to my cell phone case and it adheres really well. Never had an issue with it feeling loose or coming off. These ring holders are well made and would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: U P

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Once you put it on, it's on! I had another that can be used over and over again and it was much better. This one got is stuck from the beginning so you cannot make adjustments. UPDATE - broke quickly, won't stand. One of the others in the same packet is super stiff. I would not recommend or buy again.
customer_reviews.author: amazonmember

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and functional
customer_reviews.text: Pretty on my clear case. Great adhesion—none of the 3 (other family members Also using) have come off yet.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Not good...
customer_reviews.text: not good, the ring holder got loose and I tried to turn it right in hopes that maybe that will help it get tight again, but NOPE! Nothing worked I just threw it away. You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.author: Reyna F.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Stuck onto my phone great. The ring loses its hold after about a month or two, but it comes with four so they last a while.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Secora

customer_reviews.title: Way better than popsockets!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these cellphone rings! I had been using a popsocket but always found it to be cumbersome...useful but bulky. This ring is low profile and rotates and opens to any position that I need. My 10yo finds it works way better for her smaller hands. So glad they come 4 in a pack.
customer_reviews.author: KaeBoo

customer_reviews.title: No more dropping my phone while texting
customer_reviews.text: If you're a tad clumsy like me, you need these rings. I have them on my phone and my tablet. No more oops, I dropped it again.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Fair
customer_reviews.text: Ring holders stick well to my phone and iPad. Hard to remove. Works ok on my phone, but because the iPad is heavier, the ring tends to hurt my finger.
customer_reviews.author: Beans

customer_reviews.title: So glad I purchased!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cell phone ring holder. I have been using it for several months and it works very well. The seller sent an email after my purchase with full instructions on how to best attach the holder to my phone. Very helpful and worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen C Todaro

customer_reviews.title: To stand or not to stand...
customer_reviews.text: Stops being able to be used as a cell phone kick stand within a week after you flip the ring up and down a number of time. You can still use as a ring when talking on the phone. But it loses its entirety of its use by then.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Presley

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get these as I love the iRings. However, this one is so cheap it doesn’t work anymore and I’ve only had it on for a couple weeks. Now it’s stuck on my case and doesn’t work. The real iRings are the best!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: These rings adhered extremely well to both an OtterBox and to a cheaper, slicker cover. The transparency lets the case design show through with minimal interference. The ring is strong, so the phone can actually be carried by the ring. Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: NanRN

customer_reviews.title: Works well for about a week...
customer_reviews.text: I went through this entire pack of four within a week and a half. The sticky part really grips the phone case well, but the ring loop adhesive isn’t strong enough to withstand use. Without fail, every few days it would start getting wobbly and then fall off the phone. I know these aren’t expensive but I was looking for a replacement for my popsocket and this didn’t work out well enough. Save your money!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel W.

customer_reviews.title: Seem to work well/good quality
customer_reviews.text: Daughter is enjoying these. Seem to stick very well and do their intended job!
customer_reviews.author: EMK

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 3 days ?!?!?
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 3 days. Thr pin backed out and while removing the "thing off my phone" it broke off. Very poor quality. 3 days on my phone
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: My fav
customer_reviews.text: Love this as alternative to pop sockets--they hurt my fingers and sit awkwardly. This pack is a great value and I feel like they're much more effective as a stand, and more comfortable to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Stop Lori Now

customer_reviews.title: Best phone ring on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Best/longest lasting phone ring I've ever bought. Not to mention the great price. Plus they are clear so they go with anything.
customer_reviews.author: Devin kelley

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had one on my iPhone 8+ for over 2 months. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Larissa

customer_reviews.title: If you're a fan of patterned phone cases like me, get this!
customer_reviews.text: This is EXACTLY what I needed for my phone case. It allows the pattern on the case to show through. Easy to install and the adhesiveness is pretty good. The seller was kind enough to send an explanatory email on how to best apply it, which I found pretty helpful. Will definitely buy again if I change case!
customer_reviews.author: Maxine Y.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome price and quality for this amazing Cell phone holder
customer_reviews.text: Chose this transparent holder, because I changed the case cover for my Droid. I didn't want to hid the beautiful design behind anything. It adhered quickly and helps my hang on to my cell phone easily.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Zillig

customer_reviews.title: Love the clear background
customer_reviews.text: They are easy to install and I love that they are a clear background so it doesn’t cover my phone cover design. My only complaint is that the ring doesn’t last long before it becomes floppy and will no longer stand. I guess that’s why there are several in a pack
customer_reviews.author: Brandi L Diehl

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love these phone rings. They work really well but after a few months the ring will get lose and not hold up your phone but they come in a 4 pack and replacing them is easy
customer_reviews.author: Krista Harvey

customer_reviews.title: not as big as the iring
customer_reviews.text: I previously had the Iring and Iring holder that looks just like this product. This product is just a tad smaller and the Iring holder doesn't hold it in place. but the product itself it great. works just like the Iring and didn't cost as much!
customer_reviews.author: rebecca crabtree

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great product and very well made. Will buy again if need to.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Sever

customer_reviews.title: Small and strong
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Strong adhesive and the ring does not flop around. The surface area it covers is smaller than most I’ve seen and is clear so you can see the case or phone under it. Also does not stick out far from the phone making it less obtrusive than my last one
customer_reviews.author: Sara in GA

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product great quality, ring diameter could be a little larger for those of us with larger fingers. All things considered an excellent purchase
customer_reviews.author: Tacoma15

customer_reviews.title: Mostly great
customer_reviews.text: Loved until the finger holder gave way & didn’t hold still anymore. It still works but the part where your finger goes is no longer sturdy. It happened to all three received in package
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I like the convenience of having the ring on my phone. Installation was simple but even after following specific instructions, there are still a few little bubbles. However, that doesn’t bother me at all. Great costumer service!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy O'Hara

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and it hurts fingers
customer_reviews.text: Broke after a month. Never held the phone up properly. It’s too small and it hurts your fingers
customer_reviews.author: LB Bri

customer_reviews.title: Beware-it broke within 7 days!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look and feel of this cell phone ring holder, but it broke 7 days after I started to use it. Now, I have a sticky mess on the back of my phone case which I hope I can get off. I'm very disappointed in this product. I will go back to a Pop Socket-I had one for over a year and it didn't break.
customer_reviews.author: Esther K.

customer_reviews.title: The adhesive has a pretty strong hold
customer_reviews.text: The adhesive has a pretty strong hold. The key ring is pretty solid; it takes some strength to move it around making it pretty sturdy to support the weight on the phone when its on an incline.
customer_reviews.author: NicaJJ

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Love these, Used clear for my transparent Kate Spade glitter case on my iPhoneX would buy again but works better ergonomically on a Plus model or bigger phone. Overall a Good Buy
customer_reviews.author: TCampbell

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, and serves the purpose.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, and serves the purpose. I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ring falls off
customer_reviews.text: The ring comes loose when you turn it & eventually falls of. Mine is still on, I gave the other 3 to my friends & the ring broke off after a couple days. I
customer_reviews.author: tina

customer_reviews.title: Falls over soon after install
customer_reviews.text: Sad...the ring loses its tension soon which means it will not hold in place as a kickstand or when on your finger.
customer_reviews.author: That Girl

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative to the iring
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good. Inexpensive version of the iring. After 3-4 weeks they lose the rigidity so you have to replace which is why they give you 4 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Nesshal

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I like that I can still see my gold phone backing
customer_reviews.author: Veronica B

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the ring is very good. Stuck well to my otter box defender series case. I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Halfbackma

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Adhesive
customer_reviews.text: Once you stick this to your case is amazing there is no possibility way that will get loose, I take it EVERWHERE I even dance holding the ring only and it holds amazing
customer_reviews.author: Kloe B

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what i wanted
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for My decorative case..the designs are not covered at all..love it
customer_reviews.author: Kaity Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use and easy to install but beware if ...
customer_reviews.text: Fun to use and easy to install but beware if you want to use a wireless charger. You can't use it with a ring on the back of your case, you have to take the case off to charge it.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Erben

customer_reviews.title: For those with Bigger Phones
customer_reviews.text: I have a S9 plus. Avg sized man hands. This helps support the phone on my had so my thumbs can do their work! Has held up for 6 months. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: DREW B

customer_reviews.title: Clearly GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the clearness I won't cover up my pretty cases, very sticky!
customer_reviews.author: Diana L. Park

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for about a month. Then the ring started losing it's strength. It just swings back and forth.
customer_reviews.author: KWT

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These are so great they make it so much easier to carry your phone.
customer_reviews.author: karen scholz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! I love the clear so you can see ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I love the clear so you can see right through the mount to see the phone case design. Makes the case look look it comes with the right. Awesome! Strong hold had it on my phone for about 3 weeks so far.
customer_reviews.author: Christina marie

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: These are used on our iPhone 8+’s. They work great but one of them has a loose limp ring.
customer_reviews.author: M. Krautner

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Holds up really well. Can even use it as a stand. Prevents me from dropping my phone on my face. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Sun

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Better than any other we ever had. Actually the best ! The price was great. The delivery time was 2 days. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: JohnD

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Love it, I have been using this ring holder for a little over a year, it's still holding and secure. Unbelievable and I am amazed especially as hard as I can be on my poor phone, Inm my defense I was borne clumsy lol
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Hunter

customer_reviews.title: ... hold onto my phone with one grip but I love my phone case and I didn’t want it obscured
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something that would allow my tiny hand to hold onto my phone with one grip but I love my phone case and I didn’t want it obscured. This was perfect and it still easily fits into my back pocket. After multiple trips into my pocket it is still firmly attached to the back of my phone. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: SDW78

customer_reviews.title: JUNK GET THE ORIGINAL
customer_reviews.text: They dont rotate unless you force them. Then they get hot from friction. JUNK
customer_reviews.author: Voche68

customer_reviews.title: Works great by your bed for glasses
customer_reviews.text: We use them for the wall that hang stuff on
customer_reviews.author: Angstro

customer_reviews.title: Less dropping of my phone
customer_reviews.text: I am always dropping my phone, this little ring thing is awesome and it’s a little stand as well - love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected, love the transparency
customer_reviews.text: Phone rings were as described. Difficult to put on for me without getting tons of air bubbles, but it doesn't really bother me. Love that these are transparent so I can still see my phone case. Have been using one for a month so far and the ring is still rigid (which I like, since my old one became loose very quickly).
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: OK for the $
customer_reviews.text: The rings are a little stiff for turning. Getting 4 of them for this price is a real value.
customer_reviews.author: N. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not for big or fat fingers...
customer_reviews.text: Need a little bigger ring, a little small for me, fit everyone else!!
customer_reviews.author: Weasel

customer_reviews.title: I’d recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.text: It has a very strong hold and it’s easy to hold, the only bad thing is that if you stick it on without proper placement it’s hard to remove.
customer_reviews.author: David H.

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these and they were perfect except I ordered transparent and they came to me red..which was fine because my phone was red. But now I can’t use them with my new phone .
customer_reviews.author: Samantha C

customer_reviews.title: Handy little helper!
customer_reviews.text: It's quite handy, although it's a little difficult to predict where to put it on your phone to maximize it's efficiency for small hands. Overall, it's helpful to have while lying down and/or when propping up the phone is necessary. Easy to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Ring is Plastic, Finish Rubs Off, Looks Cheap
customer_reviews.text: The finish rubs off of the ring easy making it look cheap. Adhesion is pretty good though & it is comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: Avina

customer_reviews.title: Works really really well
customer_reviews.text: Best ringers, especially for the price. I have a note 9, and currently have 2 stuck to the back. They dont come unstuck without significant force, and they stay tight for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Perry Butt

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you place it exactly where you want it because it's not falling off anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Woeste

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality!
customer_reviews.text: These stay secure and in tact! Great buy.. nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: HAK

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful
customer_reviews.text: I've had other things but not with the flat bottom. These are so versatile and useful. Will always have one of these grim now on.
customer_reviews.author: etcbbg

customer_reviews.title: Cheap & breaks quickly
customer_reviews.text: Product was great at first but the ring stopped being able to hold the phone up after a few weeks. Now I know why they came in a pack of four- you need to replace it every two months or so. Very disappointed. will NOT purchase again. DO. NOT. BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Kelcie H.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful. I have been using this product a few ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful. I have been using this product a few weeks and is still super sturdy. Helps with my grip and eliminates any side effects with my carpal tunnel.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: 5 STARS
customer_reviews.text: These are way better than I thought they’d be. I will be using these on everything now, and I HIGHLY recommend these to anyone. The ring doesn’t loosen like other ring holders I’ve used.
customer_reviews.author: Julee Morris-Seminole

customer_reviews.text: It looks cool and it holds up for a week or two but then it just falls a part.
customer_reviews.author: Trustmyreviews

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Loved the extras. Holds tight to my phone and does not compromise my phone case design.
customer_reviews.author: Kaelyn Grey

customer_reviews.title: At first perfect, then breaks (2 in a row)
customer_reviews.text: My original review would have been 5 stars but a week in it broke. Tried to fix it with no luck. And removing this once it’s on is a real pain,it does not want to come off (and I like this case)! Very disappointed. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa Desiree Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Great knock off
customer_reviews.text: Great knock off for the name brand. Sturdy easy to attach to phone casing
customer_reviews.author: T-Raw

product_meta.title: Transparent Cell Phone Ring Holder, 360 Degree Rotation, Finger Grip Stand Holder iPhone and ipad Tablet Ring Holder (2 Black + 2 Silver)
feature_bullets: Transparent Design: This phone ring is made to be transparent, allowing you to keep the unique design of your phone case but also giving you the features of having a phone ring holder.
Free Rotation: 360 degree rotation and 180 degree fold help you adjust your phone to different viewing angles to reading, watch videos.

High Viscosity, strong sticky adhensive makes sure the ring be attached tightly to the back of your phone/tablet. The few sticky residue left after detaching can be wipe off by rubbing alcohol easily.

Improve One-Hand Operation Experience: Now you can use your phone with only one hand more easily and safely. The phone ring offer a firm girp, which prevents your phone from dropping & reduces the risk of theft.

Excellent After-Sales Servic: We hope you like our product and your satisfaction is our top priority. If you have any problems with our product, please contact with us first, we will solve it for you within 24 hours.
